[COLOR lavender][B]Order Favourites - Swap Version[/B][/COLOR]
[B]1.0.0:[/B] - Original release of the "Swap" version of Order Favourites.
extension.description: Lets you reorder the entries in your Favourites by "swapping" entries in your Favourites list. Select "A" then "B" - "A" will be placed where "B" is and vice versa. Use this to quickly and easily organize your Favourites.
